title: Calories in a Hershey's Kiss
meta_description: Learn calories in hershey kiss—about 22 kcal each—with full nutrition facts, macros, tweaks, and FAQs for this milk chocolate candy.
assumptions: Standard milk chocolate Hershey's Kiss, ~4.6 g each, no fillings or variations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, size, and manufacturer; values based on averages. Check packaging for exact details.

quick_answer.text: One Hershey's Kiss provides about 22 kcal, mostly from sugar and fat.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in one Hershey's Kiss?
faqs.a: Approximately 22 kcal for a standard milk chocolate one.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a Hershey's Kiss?
faqs.a: About 2.6 g carbs, including 2.3 g sugars and 0.2 g fiber per kiss.

faqs.q: Is there protein in Hershey's Kisses?
faqs.a: Yes, roughly 0.3 g protein per kiss from milk solids.

faqs.q: How much fat is in a Hershey's Kiss?
faqs.a: Around 1.3 g total fat, with 0.8 g saturated fat per kiss.

faqs.q: Do Hershey's Kisses have trans fat?
faqs.a: Typically 0 g trans fat in standard milk chocolate Kisses.
